sentences.english: I think lots of faculty feel that way.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得許多教職工都有這樣的感覺。

sentences.english: The teaching staff shoulders the responsibility of teaching and educating students.
sentences.chinese: 教職工肩負着教書育人的責任。

sentences.english: Students and university staff are chucked together at this event.
sentences.chinese: 學生和大學教職工在這場賽事上相遇了。

sentences.english: A number of experienced staff went with the students on both Shanghai and Beijing trips.
sentences.chinese: 隨行的還包括我校幾位有豐富面試經驗的教職工。

sentences.english: It's made of faculty, administrators, and students.
sentences.chinese: 它是由教職工，行政管理人員還有學生組成的。

sentences.english: Responsible to oversee and enforce policies to insure faculty abides by stated policy.
sentences.chinese: 負責監督和執行考勤制度保證教職工遵守我們的制度。

sentences.english: What about from the faculty side?
The union at universities is the mass organization of university faculty under the leadership of the Party.
sentences.chinese: 高校工會是黨領導下的教職工羣衆組織。

sentences.english: All the teachers, staff members and students are expected to attend on time.
sentences.chinese: 希望全校教職工和學生準時出席。

definition: student of a senior high school

pinyin: Guang3 dong1 Wai4 yu3 Wai4 mao4 Da4 xue2

definition: to confer/to consult/to negotiate/to hold a conference

pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Di4 er4 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Xue2 yuan4
Ha1 er3 bin1 Gong1 ye4 Da4 xue2
